members.member:
Allows a user to unassign contacts from an organisation. Should provide the assigned contacts contactpoint ids as a query parameter list
Ok Unauthorised Forbidden Not found Bad request. Error Codes: ERROR_INVALID_UNASSIGNING_CONTACT_POINT_IDS
Sample request:
POST /organisations/1/assigned-contacts?contact-point-ids=2
s

members.member:
Allows a user to assign user contacts for an organisation site
Ok. Return assigned site contact ids Unauthorised Forbidden Not found Bad request. Error Codes: ERROR_INVALID_ASSIGNING_CONTACT_POINT_IDS, ERROR_INVALID_CONTACT_ASSIGNEMNT_TYPE, ERROR_INVALID_USER_ID_FOR_CONTACT_ASSIGNEMNT, ERROR_DUPLICATE_CONTACT_ASSIGNMENT
Sample request:
POST /organisations/1/sites/1/assigned-contacts { "AssigningContactType": 1, (User:1, Site:2 Only user contacts are valid here) "AssigningContactPointIds": [1, 2], "AssigningContactsUserId": "user@mail.com" }
s

Allows a user to unassign contacts from an organisation site. Should provide the assigned contacts contactpoint ids as a query parameter list
Ok Unauthorised Forbidden Not found Bad request. Error Codes: ERROR_INVALID_UNASSIGNING_CONTACT_POINT_IDS
Sample request:
DELETE /organisations/1/sites/1/assigned-contacts?contactPointIds=2
s
